ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Wish list...
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Holy moley, Talies.  That s better than the off-hand weapon I have at level 59, and I get a lot of jealous comments about the one I ve GOT.  Crystalline
ygData.messageBody:
Talies the Wanderer wrote:

> Did the scrap metal quest in Akanon, and recieved The Horn of Hsagra - 13 /
> 20 piercing, WAR, SHD, ROG, RNG, +35 AC +75 HP and some other assorted
> stats. Looked like a rat tooth, so I almost trashed it!!!

Holy moley, Talies. That's better than the off-hand weapon I have at level 59, and I get a lot of jealous
comments about the one I've GOT. Crystalline Short Sword (12/24) goes for 12k, just to give you an idea,
and yours has more damage and less delay. I'd say it's worth quite a bit more than a BoH (maybe 2-3
times, the BoH is common enough that the price is dropping). The Lute of the Howler plus a Nostrolo's (or
at least the hard coins) deal that you suggested is one that wouldn't shaft you. They might not see it
that way, but I certainly think it would be more than fair of you.

Kenross Cantoforjado, 59 songs, Innoruuk
